column6:
"Brothers & Keepers (Adelphoite Phylaxes)" ,2005,1
Cap tracks MODOK to his secret lair but discovers the unexpected: MODOK doesn't know him! Time's running out! What's happened to MODOK and, ethically, should Cap do anything about it? Meanwhile, the Falcon has gone AWOL in mid-mission, leaving Cap and the Anti-Cap to settle the score once and for all! Part 4 (of 5).
column8: | penciller (cover):Joe Bennett | colorist:Transparency Digital | inker:Jack Jadson | writer:Christopher Priest | letterer:Dave Sharpe
